structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: The boards created pursuant to KRS 164.131, 164.321, and 164.821 shall be successor boards to those established pursuant to KRS 164.130, 164.320, and 164.820 and shall assure continuance of all legal and contractual rights, functions, duties, and liabilities, including, but not limited to, those associated with outstanding bonds.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 9, effective July 1, 1992.
